FwQueries.lastmodifiedstamp: select top 1 Updstmp from CmObject where class$ in (5002, 5016) order by Updstmp desc
FwQueries.veracularwritingsystems: SELECT * FROM LanguageProject_VernacularWritingSystems lp INNER JOIN LgWritingSystem_Name lg ON lp.Dst = lg.Obj
FwQueries.analysiswritingsystems: SELECT * FROM LanguageProject_AnalysisWritingSystems lp INNER JOIN LgWritingSystem_Name lg ON lp.Dst = lg.Obj
FwQueries.datafromlexemeform: SELECT DISTINCT LexEntry.DateCreated, LexEntry.DateModified As Date, LexSense_Gloss.Txt As Gloss, MoForm_Form.Txt As Phonetic, CmPossibility_Abbreviation.Txt As POS, CmObject.Guid$ As Guid, MoForm_Form.Ws FROM LexEntry Inner Join LexEntry_Senses (readuncommitted) On LexEntry_Senses.Src = LexEntry.id Inner Join LexSense (readuncommitted) On LexEntry_Senses.Dst = LexSense.id Inner Join LexSense_Gloss (readuncommitted) On LexSense_Gloss.Obj = LexSense.id Inner Join LexEntry_LexemeForm (readuncommitted) On LexEntry_LexemeForm.Src = LexEntry.id Inner Join MoForm (readuncommitted) On LexEntry_LexemeForm.Dst = MoForm.id Inner Join MoForm_Form (readuncommitted) On MoForm_Form.Obj = MoForm.id Inner Join LexEntry_MorphoSyntaxAnalyses (readuncommitted) On LexEntry_MorphoSyntaxAnalyses.Src = LexEntry.id Inner Join MoStemMsa (readuncommitted) On MoStemMsa.id = LexEntry_MorphoSyntaxAnalyses.Dst Inner Join PartOfSpeech (readuncommitted) On MoStemMsa.PartOfSpeech = PartOfSpeech.id Inner Join CmPossibility (readuncommitted) On PartOfSpeech.id = CmPossibility.id Inner Join CmPossibility_Name (readuncommitted) On CmPossibility_Name.Obj = CmPossibility.id Inner Join CmPossibility_Abbreviation (readuncommitted) On CmPossibility_Abbreviation.Obj = CmPossibility.id Inner Join CmObject (readuncommitted) On LexEntry.id = CmObject.Id WHERE LexEntry_Senses.Ord = 1 And LexSense_Gloss.Ws = $EnglishGlossWs And MoForm_Form.Ws = $PhoneticWs And CmPossibility_Name.Ws = $EnglishGlossWs And CmPossibility_Abbreviation.Ws = $EnglishGlossWs
FwQueries.datafrompronunciationfield: SELECT DISTINCT LexEntry.DateCreated, LexEntry.DateModified As Date, LexSense_Gloss.Txt As Gloss, LexPronunciation_Form.Txt As Phonetic, MoForm_Form.Txt As Phonemic, CmPossibility_Abbreviation.Txt As POS, CmObject.Guid$ As Guid, MoForm_Form.Ws FROM LexEntry Inner Join LexEntry_Senses (readuncommitted) On LexEntry_Senses.Src = LexEntry.id Inner Join LexSense (readuncommitted) On LexEntry_Senses.Dst = LexSense.id Inner Join LexSense_Gloss (readuncommitted) On LexSense_Gloss.Obj = LexSense.id Inner Join LexEntry_Pronunciations (readuncommitted) On LexEntry_Pronunciations.Src = LexEntry.id Inner Join LexPronunciation (readuncommitted) On LexEntry_Pronunciations.Dst = LexPronunciation.id Inner Join LexPronunciation_Form (readuncommitted) On LexPronunciation_Form.Obj = LexPronunciation.id Inner Join LexEntry_LexemeForm (readuncommitted) On LexEntry_LexemeForm.Src = LexEntry.id Inner Join MoForm (readuncommitted) On dbo.LexEntry_LexemeForm.Dst = MoForm.id Inner Join MoForm_Form (readuncommitted) On MoForm_Form.Obj = MoForm.id Inner Join CmObject (readuncommitted) On LexEntry.id = CmObject.Id Inner Join MoStemMsa_ (readuncommitted) On LexSense.MorphoSyntaxAnalysis = MoStemMsa_.Id Inner Join PartOfSpeech_ (readuncommitted) On MoStemMsa_.PartOfSpeech = PartOfSpeech_.Id Inner Join CmPossibility_Abbreviation (readuncommitted) On CmPossibility_Abbreviation.Obj = PartOfSpeech_.Id Inner Join CmPossibility_Name (readuncommitted) On CmPossibility_Name.Obj = PartOfSpeech_.Id WHERE LexEntry_Senses.Ord = 1 And LexSense_Gloss.Ws = $EnglishGlossWs And LexPronunciation_Form.Ws = $PhoneticWs And MoForm_Form.Ws = $PhonemicWs And CmPossibility_Name.Ws = $EnglishGlossWs And CmPossibility_Abbreviation.Ws = $EnglishGlossWs
